titleStmt.title: National Library of Scotland Advocates MS 72.1.6

body.p:
cenl- feargra(?) :: s(?)os benn s̄̇ed(?). asur mac
deic mac eogainn uas(?) gach(?) cloid̄ feb
albinnd̄(?) in̈idhach ocus for conra so(? ro) gart eochu
ceol-(?) cormac immorro damm dearbh dhar
amo(?) cendgar(?) ethan(?) is ailno(?) Feargra mac
da les cogain da mac les .i. aedh a quo c*(?)
inaedho feardgra ⁊ coilbadh da mac leo sein
cairill ⁊ coisber aen(?) mac la cairbri .i. fedon(?)

da rí cairsce (cairrce?) brachaide ⁊ diarmait

e o tat c*(?) cinmach a tuaith ⁊ ane
as ⁊ o tat c*(?) baeth elaigh(?) ⁊ .h. chanai ⁊
